# isPaused

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the broadcast is paused.

## Declaration

```swift
var isPaused: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

When set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the broadcast is paused.

## Retrieving Information About the Broadcast

- **broadcastExtensionBundleID**: The bundle ID for the selected broadcast service.
- **isBroadcasting**: A Boolean value indicating whether the controller is broadcasting.
